description: Phase 0: TP/SL optimization with VALID trailing stop combinations (distance < activation) and ADAPTIVE STOPS DISABLED
notes: Total: 1x3x3x3x2 = 54 combinations (~45 min at 50 sec/run). CRITICAL: Must set adaptive_stop_mode=fixed to use static TP/SL values instead of ATR-based dynamic stops. Baseline: SL=25, TP=80, trailing_activation=25, trailing_distance=20.
